price: Je li doprla do tebe vijest o uvaženim gostima Ibrahimovim?
arabic: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيۡفِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ ٱلۡمُكۡرَمِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: hal atāka ḥadīthu ḍayfi ib'rāhīma al-muk'ramīna
